quotes.quote: The best way to prepare for death is to live life to its fullest.
A life without cause is a life without effect.
Life is not the way it's supposed to be. It's the way it is. The way you deal with it is what makes the difference.
One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
The purpose of life, after all, is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
Cherish your yesterdays, dream your tomorrows and live your todays.
Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
It is not the years in your life but the life in your years that counts.
Live the life you've dreamed.
Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
What is the meaning of life? To be happy and useful.
When you realize you're alive, you can live life!
Life is a game, play it; Life is a challenge, Meet it; Life is an opportunity, Capture it.
Today's moment becomes memory of tomorrow. Embrace each moment with happiness, joy and fulfillment. Strive to enjoy your day to the fullest.
There'll be two dates on your tombstone and all your friends will read 'em but all that's gonna matter is that little dash between 'em.
Life isn't worth living unless you're willing to take some big chances and go for broke.
There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them.
When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, I used everything you gave me.
I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
Life is a one time gift. Use it in best possible manner. So love, laugh, live, be yourself, be happy and have trust in God.
Live life to the fullest because it only happens once.
If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
